Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Nimbus Sanctum
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Nimbus Sanctum to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Nimbus Sanctum to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Sigh*... I wonder if he had made it back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's about a security guard who encountered some... strange things.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The weather seemed to have a mind of its own, and there were strange figures in the mist... What could that be?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I really hope he made it back home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When he met his mother, all his fears would surely disappear.
